file_content.text: Citizens of Makeb: It's my pleasure to share an exciting opportunity offered by the generous Toborro the Hutt.
As repayment for any inconveniences brought about during this time of transition, all citizens are offered a percentage of profits from Toborro's mining operations.
You'll be contacted shortly on how to receive your credits. Any non-compliance with Cartel directives will forfeit your share.
Citizens of Makeb: Please disregard any rumors regarding the recent ground tremors.
Don't be fooled by lies. These tremors are the result of small, natural changes in Makeb's lunar cycle.
Anyone trying to induce panic by suggesting a connection between ground tremors and everyday mining operations should be reported to your closest Cartel representative.
Citizens of Makeb, this is Vice Commandant Grevin of the Regulators with an important message from the Hutt Cartel.
Compliance with these directives is mandatory, for the safety of everyone. Any non-compliance should be reported to your closest representative. Rewards are offered.
Any directives issued by the Hutts or their representatives are only designed to protect you during this time of transition.
